name: Viktor, Innovator
description: When you play a card on an opponent's turn, play a 1 MIGHT Recruit unit token in your base.

name: Flurry of Blades
description: [REACTION] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.) Deal 1 to all units at battlefields.

name: Pakaa Cub
description: [HIDDEN] (Hide now for 1 RUNE_RAINBOW to react with later for 0 RUNES.)

description: [HIDDEN] (Hide now for 1 RUNE_RAINBOW to react with later for 0 RUNES.)
flavorText: Oh, it's so cute! - Common last words

description: [ACCELERATE] (You may pay 1 RUNE AND 1 RUNE_BODY as an additional cost to have me enter ready.) Other buffed friendly units at my battlefield have +2 MIGHT.

name: Lee Sin, Centered

name: Primal Strength

name: Volibear, Imposing

description: [EXHAUST SEAL OF DISCORD]: [REACTION] - [ADD] 1 RUNE_CHAOS. (Abilities that add resources can't be reacted to.)

description: [GANKING] (I can move from battlefield to battlefield.) The third time I move in a turn, you score 1 point.

description: [REACTION] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.) As you play this, you may spend a buff as an additional cost. If you do, ignore this spell's cost. Give a unit +3 MIGHT this turn.

name: Daring Poro

name: Daring Poro
description: [ASSAULT] (+1 MIGHT while I'm an attacker.)

flavorText: What do we make? Beats me, but we do it better than anyone else.

name: Facebreaker

name: Vengeance
description: Kill a unit.
